last_episode_to_air.name: Everything. Anything.
last_episode_to_air.overview: As June copes with the news of Harry's absence, John snoops around Halvorson's office, and a surprise visitor sets a fateful showdown in motion.

name: The Innocents
overview: When a teenage couple runs away to be together, the extraordinary gift they possess unleashes powerful forces intent on dividing them forever.

episodes.name: The Start of Us
episodes.overview: Eager to escape her controlling dad, June prepares to skip town with boyfriend Harry. But a harrowing encounter upends their plans.

episodes.name: Keep Calm, Come to No Harm
episodes.overview: As a shellshocked June and Harry try to understand what's happening, their parents realize they've gone missing. Dr. Halvorson runs tests on Elena.

episodes.name: Bubblegum & Bleach
episodes.overview: While John and Ryan race to London, a sympathetic stranger offers Harry and June a place to crash -- and a way to make easy money on the club circuit.

episodes.name: Deborah
episodes.overview: June's next shift yields new discoveries about the extent of her powers. Alf begins to question Steinar's intentions. Runa's jealousy boils over.

episodes.name: Passionate Amateur
episodes.overview: A viral video leads June to a fellow shifter who offers to be her mentor, stoking tensions with Harry. Christine makes a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Not the Only Freak in Town
episodes.overview: The footage from the Pennines Five case pushes Harry over the edge. Halvorson arrives in London with an unwelcome surprise for Steinar.

episodes.name: Will You Take Me Too?
episodes.overview: June travels to Sanctum, determined to find out why her mother left home. Harry and John set their differences aside for a rescue mission.

episodes.name: Everything. Anything.
episodes.overview: As June copes with the news of Harry's absence, John snoops around Halvorson's office, and a surprise visitor sets a fateful showdown in motion.
